title: 3DTILES_metadata object
description: An object containing description of metadata available

classes.description: A dictionary, where each key is a class ID and each value is an object defining the class.

classesUri.description: A uri to an external JSON resource containing the classes. The external JSON resource must follow the same schema as `classes`. `classes` and `classesUri` cannot both be supplied. If neither `classes` nor `classesUri` is supplied the classes should be supplied through some other means.
